sentences.content: Key Message
There is a high incidence of litter ingestion by sea turtles in the Bay of Biscay, Azores and Macaro...
but with regional differences. Mean abundance of ingested plastics was 9,6, 16,3 and 16,3 pieces
respectively. This new common indicator provides the baseline for further monitoring and evaluation
of trends.
Conclusion (brief)
The compilation of data on ingested litter by the sea turtle Caretta caretta in OSPAR Regions IV, V,...
Macaronesia, provides consistent data on the evaluation of impact of litter on this marine organism.
This first assessment of the Common Indicator “marine litter ingested by sea turtles” indicates a hi...
incidence of litter ingestion by sea turtles in OSPAR Regions IV, V, and Macaronesia, but with regio...
Conclusion (extended)
As it stands, this initial assessment provides consistent data and the technical and scientific basi...
future implementation of monitoring. Further implementation of sampling will also enable a larger
coverage of sampling, to record all stranded animals in all parts of Regions IV, V, and Macaronesia.
A
